WebSound - Affordable, Reliable Hosting Solutions


Virtualizor Control Panel | KVM Virtualization | DDoS Protection | US Location | 1Gbps Uplinks | Weekly Backups | 99.9% Uptime Guaranteed | 7 Day Money Back Guarantee​

We're pleased to make available our first off here at the VPSBoard Community, and welcome you to ask any questions or queries you may have by posting below, or contacting us directly via our website.

 

WebSound Information:

WebSound specializes in providing affordable, reliable web hosting solutions. WebSound cater for all kinds of clientele, offering premium, quality support and services at affordable prices. We meet the needs of all clients, offering a range of services and packages to ensure clients have a choice of packages suitable for their requirements.

 

Our teams are trained to assist with a large variety of issues, from software based problems to server related queries, we're always happy to assist. WebSound strive to provide quality support, that's why on average, all the support tickets we receive are responded to within 1 hour, we also guarantee a response within 24 hours, at the absolute maximum. The current average response time can be found at the top of our website and client area. 

 

Special Offers:


  • 20% recurring discount with promotional code KVMH20


  • One month free when you choose the Semi-Annual billing cycle, two months free when you choose the Annual billing cycle!

All packages include:


  • 7 Day Money Back Guarantee


  • 99.9% Uptime Guarantee


  • DDoS Protection


  • Instant Activation


  • Weekly Backups


  • Virtualizor Control Panel

 

Datacenters:


  • Las Vegas, United States - FiberHub Datacenter
